name: Benthic Behemoth
text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

editions.flavor: The sea has many secrets, but some are too big to be kept.

"Deep devourer   concealed in darkhome
Shrouded it seeks   all becomes fodder
Once we swam   alone and asea
But no more."
—Rootwater Saga

name: Benthic Djinn
text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

editions.flavor:
"In all my years I've only met one mage who successfully trapped a djinn—and none who tried and failed."
—Talibah, embermage

name: Benthic Explorers
text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Distant Atlantis charged these Explorers with the task of venturing into unknown waters to track the despised Viscerids.
The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.
The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

name: Benthic Giant
text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

editions.flavor:
"Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them."
—Callaphe the mariner

name: Benthic Infiltrator
text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)
Benthic Infiltrator can't be blocked.

name: Benthicore
text:
When Benthicore enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature tokens.
Tap two untapped Merfolk you control: Untap Benthicore. It gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

name: Bequeathal
text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.

editions.flavor:
"On my death, I give you this treasure: the knowledge that life is hard, yet too soon past."
—Dal funeral rite

name: Bereavement
text: Whenever a green creature dies, its controller discards a card.

editions.flavor:
"Grief is as useless as love."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor
Grief is a razor that slices the soul.

name: Berserk
text:
Cast Berserk only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

name: Berserkers of Blood Ridge
text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each turn if able.

editions.flavor: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.
They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

name: Berserkers' Onslaught
text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

editions.flavor:
"Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence."
—Arel, Unseen Whisperer

name: Berserk Murlodont
text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

editions.flavor:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."

name: Bioplasm
text: Whenever Bioplasm attacks, exile the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, Bioplasm gets +X/+Y until end of turn, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

name: Biorhythm

name: Blast of Genius
text: Choose target creature or player. Draw three cards, then discard a card. Blast of Genius deals damage equal to the discarded card's converted mana cost to that creature or player.

editions.flavor: Ral Zarek's brainstorms bring actual thunder and lightning.

name: Blatant Thievery
text: For each opponent, gain control of target permanent that player controls.

editions.flavor: "I'll leave subtlety to the rich."
"I'll leave subtlety to the rich."

name: Blaze
text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: Fire never dies alone.
Fire never dies alone.
Fire never dies alone.
Fire never dies alone.
Fire never dies alone.
Fire never dies alone.

"This isn't what I meant by ‘facing the heat of battle!'"
—Jefan, Talas ship captain

"Spreading flames illumined cloud and sea:
Cao Cao went down; 'twas Zhou Yu's victory."

name: Blaze Commando
text: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage, create two 1/1 red and white Soldier creature tokens with haste.

editions.flavor: A true Boros commando only calls for reinforcements so they can clean up the mess.

name: Blaze of Glory
text:
Cast Blaze of Glory only during combat before blockers are declared.
Target creature defending player controls can block any number of creatures this turn. It blocks each attacking creature this turn if able.

name: Blazethorn Scarecrow
text:
Blazethorn Scarecrow has haste as long as you control a red creature.
Blazethorn Scarecrow has wither as long as you control a green creature. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

name: Blazing Archon
text:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you.

editions.flavor:
"Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."
—Dravin, Gruul deserter

—Dravin, Gruul deserter
